title: A walk down the 90's..a few nostalgic memories
selftext:
Guys who are fed up with life in modern times please enjoy your childhood memories (90s kids) as I share this YouTube video: https://youtu.be/VX3gqs5ob5Y
Life was simple back then not only for us because we were kids and had no responsibility but also for our parents it was less of a struggle. People valued relationship and friendships as opposed to "use and throw" Everything from goods, gadgets to friends, lovers, spouses, employers, employees... Everything has become use and throw now including people... 
Please share your thoughts guys...
